title: Finding Cyn
description: Beaten and broken down by the man who was suppose to be her happy ending, Cyn’s lost and alone, with no happy ending in sight. Can Rigid break through Cyn’s walls, showing her she is more than her shattered past, or will her demons consume her before Rigid can find her?  Due to sexual content and profanity, this book is recommended for ages 18+.
author: Winter Travers
